text: Hum aap kay chehray ko baar baar aasman ki taraf uthtay uthtay huye dekh rahey hain abb hum aap ko uss qiblay ki janib mutawajja keren gay jiss say aap khush hojayen aap apna mun masjid-e-haram ki taraf pher len aur aap jahan kahin hon apna mun ussi taraf phera keren. Ehal-e-kitab ko iss baat kay Allah ki taraf say bar haq honey ka qataee ilm hai aur Allah Taalaa unn aemaal say ghafil nahi jo yeh kertay hain
